author: Obi-Wan3
description: Various tools for managing custom emojis in servers.
install_msg: Thank you for installing. **IMPORTANT**: The `[p]emojiools save` command group will allow server admins to save emojis to folders in the cog data path, which they can upload to Discord as a `.zip` archive at any time. For large public bots, it is highly recommended to restrict usage of or disable the `[p]emojitools save` command group. The other cog features do **NOT** require permanent storage but do result in temporary files, with some IO usage.
